title: EOProxy Tool
description: Network packet analyzer for Endless Online.
details: Updated for the latest EO patch with logging and filtering.

title: Captcha Solver (Trashman Edition)
details: You must download Tesseract: https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract/releases/download/5.5.0/tesseract-ocr-w64-setup-5.5.0.20241111.exe. Once installed, run the captcha script.

title: Tesseract For Captcha Solver
description: Required OCR engine for the captcha solver.
details: You must download Tesseract for the captcha solver to run.

title: Walkable Recorder
description: Record tiles for your CeraBot to follow and use.
details: An easy-to-use recorder to create your walkable.json files for CeraBot.

title: CeraBot 7
details: Melee, walk, gain EXP. AFK bot.

title: Captcha Solver (LEGACY)
description: Automated OCR-based captcha bypass (known issue with small 'k').
details: You must download Tesseract: https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract/releases/download/5.5.0/tesseract-ocr-w64-setup-5.5.0.20241111.exe. Once installed, run the captcha script.
